text: Just bought the new iPhone 15! Camera quality is insane ðŸ“¸ Best upgrade ever!
Tesla's autopilot almost crashed my car today. This is completely unacceptable!
Amazing customer service from Apple Store! They replaced my defective device immediately without any hassle.
Terrible experience with Tesla service center. Waited 3 hours and they couldn't even diagnose the problem.
The new MacBook Pro M3 is an absolute game changer for developers! Compilation times are incredible.
Tesla battery is draining way too fast in cold weather. Very disappointed with the range.
Apple's new iOS 17 update fixed all my battery issues. Finally! Love the new features too.
Tesla Supercharger network is hands down the best thing about owning this car. So convenient!
My iPhone keeps freezing and crashing randomly. Worst phone I've ever had. Regretting this purchase.
Tesla Model 3 is the most fun car I've ever driven! Instant acceleration never gets old.
Apple Watch literally saved my life by detecting an irregular heartbeat. Got medical help just in time!
Latest Tesla software update completely broke my car's infotainment system. Can't even use navigation now.
The Apple ecosystem just works seamlessly. iPhone, Mac, Watch, AirPods - everything syncs perfectly.
Tesla quality control is absolutely terrible. Panel gaps, paint defects everywhere. For $60k this is unacceptable.
AirPods Pro 2 are worth every single penny. Best noise cancellation I've ever experienced!
Got stranded in my Tesla with a dead 12V battery. Customer support was completely useless. Never buying Tesla again.
iPhone 15 Pro battery easily lasts all day with heavy use. Super impressed with the battery optimization!
Tesla paint is already chipping after just 6 months of ownership. This is absolutely unbelievable.
Apple TV+ has some truly amazing original shows. Ted Lasso and Severance are masterpieces!
Tesla Autopilot is genuinely revolutionary technology. I can't imagine driving without it anymore.
Apple Silicon M3 Max is ridiculously powerful. Video rendering that used to take hours now takes minutes!
Tesla service appointment scheduling is a nightmare. Impossible to get a slot within 3 weeks.
Face ID on iPhone works flawlessly even in complete darkness. Such brilliant technology!
My Tesla's screen went completely black while driving on the highway. Extremely dangerous situation!
Apple's privacy features are industry-leading. Finally a company that actually cares about user data protection.
Tesla promised Full Self-Driving years ago. Still waiting. Feels like vaporware at this point.
The iPhone 15 Pro titanium design is stunning and so much lighter than previous models!
Tesla mobile service came to my house and fixed everything. Super convenient and professional!
Apple's App Store policies are anti-competitive and hurt developers. This monopoly needs to end.
Tesla Model Y is the perfect family SUV. Spacious, safe, and fun to drive. Highly recommend!
